original_title: NASCAR Hall of Fame Biography: Dale Earnhardt
overview: Profiling Dale Earnhardt, one of five inaugural inductees. The seven-time Cup Series champ known as "The Intimidator" won 76 races before his tragic death in the 2001 Daytona 500. Earnhardt's No. 3 was retired from the circuit.
title: NASCAR Hall of Fame Biography: Dale Earnhardt
